name: Add repository to installation
description:
Add a single repository to an installation. The authenticated user must have admin access to the repository.

You must use a personal access token (which you can create via the [command line](https://help.github.com/articles/creating-a-personal-access-token-for-the-command-line/) or the [OAuth Authorizations API](/enterprise/2.12/v3/oauth_authorizations/#create-a-new-authorization)) or [Basic Authentication](/enterprise/2.12/v3/auth/#basic-authentication) to access this endpoint.
